# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(Spheral_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(Spheral)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
SpheralPluginInfo.C
SpheralCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
SpheralPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
SpheralMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSpheralFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
SpheralEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtSpheralFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(ISpheralDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ISpheralDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ISpheralDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MSpheralDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MSpheralDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MSpheralDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MSpheralDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ESpheralDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESpheralDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESpheralDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESpheralDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ESpheralDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ESpheralDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ESpheralDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ESpheralDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases Spheral ${INSTALLTARGETS})
